description: Securely retrieves environment variables or API keys (secrets) needed for various operations. Access to sensitive secrets requires human approval. Less sensitive variables might be available without explicit approval, as defined by the system backend.

secret_name.description: The exact name of the environment variable or secret to retrieve (e.g., 'ANTHROPIC_API_KEY', 'DB_PASSWORD', 'DEFAULT_N8N_WEBHOOK_URL').

response_format: JSON containing the 'value' of the requested secret. Example: {"secret_name": "ANTHROPIC_API_KEY", "value": "sk-abc123..."}
